page.title: 15Religion LISVANE
page.content: Wlthin the area ther are many { {Christian denominations}the main ones being Church in Wales.Baptist & Roman Catholic.These have four churches serving the area,only 2 of which are actually inside the boundary of our block.i)Lisvane Baptist church is 203 years old with an open-air baptistry measure 10x6 feet which is fed by a stream.About 50 people attend this church.ii)Parts of the building of St.Denys(Church in Wales)date from the13th.century & it has an attendance of between 150-200 people.111)4or5 persons also attend St. Isan's(Church in Wales)situated outside our block in Llanishen.iv)Between 75-100 Roman Catholics from Lisvane/Thornhill worship at Christ the King church at Llanishen.There are also a small number of practising Jews & Muslims who worship in other parts of Cardiff.
